title: 10 Simple yet Useful Tasker Profiles for beginners (Part 3)
tags: What are the coolest things that can be done with Tasker
description: Here are some simple tasker profiles that everyone can use.   1. Increase brightness for incoming calls - 0.39 2. Disable keyguard on Home - 2.10 3. Automatic silent based on location - 3.51 4. AutoRotate for Specific apps   - 4.29 5. Auto turn ON and OFF GPS - 5.08 6. Quickly Check internet connection -  6.24 7. Open Multiple Websites  -  7.40 8. Show menu when headset is plugged - 8.28 9. Send location in SMS - 9.10 [ROOT require] 10. Random inspiration quotes - 1.16  [Useful links]  Tasker   Secure setting   Motivational Quotes   Other Tasker video
